channel.title: David Dreyer Lassen
channel.description: Recent content on David Dreyer Lassen

item.description: I am professor of Economics at the University of Copenhagen. I am the founding director of the Center for Social Data Science (SODAS) and co-deputy director of the Center for Economic Behavior and Inequality (CEBI), established in 2017 through a grant from the Danish National Research Foundation. I am the Chair of the Independent Research Fund Denmark (DFF), and was a member of the 2017-8 Committee for Better University Education (Udvalget for bedre universitetsuddannelser).
